div.div: As per the NJDOE mandate, all NJ school districts are required to share their Flexible Learning Plan model during this health-related school closure. Hillsborough Township Public School's Flexible Learning Plan is attached.
COVID-19 School Messenger Communications from Dr. Lisa M. Antunes, Acting Superintendent
The district has developed a website for families to use for resources and assistance with Technology use for Virtual Learning.
Parents who suspect their pre-school aged child may have special needs may obtain free help from their local school district's Child Study Team

HTPS invites you to celebrate the first inaugural International Social Emotional Learning (SEL) Day on March 27, 2020. As such, we have culled some ideas and resources to support the development of SEL; which is much needed during this COVID-19 global pandemic.

Kindergarten registration and CAP lottery for the 2020-2021 school year have been postponed until further notice. We request that you complete the online pre-registration if you have a child to enroll in kindergarten for September 2020.
Click here for information and the application for the Integrated Preschool Program.
Information for Upcoming Local Events in Our Area
Comparisons of HTPS NJSLA/PARCC Administrations - three year report from Spring 2017 to Spring 2019.
Click here for details on the 2019-2020 User Friendly Budget.
